    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static String getEngineUrl()
      Returns URL for this engine.
      static String getEngineUrl(String serverSpec)
      Returns engine URL for another server, using server specification as input.
      static void init(String restServiceContext) 
      static boolean internalMessageUsingJms() 
      static InternalMessenger newInternalMessenger() 
      static IntraMDWMessenger newIntraMDWMessenger(String serverSpec)
      Server specification can be one of the following forms a) URL of the form t3://host:port, iiop://host:port, rmi://host:port, http://host:port/context_and_path b) a logical server name, in which case the URL is obtained from property mdw.remote.server. c) server_name@URL d) null, in which case it indicates on the same site (same domain)

        public static InternalMessenger newInternalMessenger()

      • newIntraMDWMessenger

        public static IntraMDWMessenger newIntraMDWMessenger(String serverSpec)
                                              throws NamingException
        Server specification can be one of the following forms a) URL of the form t3://host:port, iiop://host:port, rmi://host:port, http://host:port/context_and_path b) a logical server name, in which case the URL is obtained from property mdw.remote.server. c) server_name@URL d) null, in which case it indicates on the same site (same domain)
        Parameters:
        serverSpec - see description above
        Returns:
        the messenger for the corresponding server
        Throws:
        NamingException

      • internalMessageUsingJms

        public static boolean internalMessageUsingJms()

      • getEngineUrl

        public static String getEngineUrl()
                           throws NamingException
        Returns URL for this engine. Used to pass it to remove servers: a) when invoking a remote process b) when sending message to remote detail task manager c) for central task manager to generate a unique session ID when linking to detail page For WebLogic: t3://host:port (works for both JMS for RMI. iiop may work as well for RMI) For Tomcat: rmi://host:port
        Throws:
        NamingException

      • getEngineUrl

        public static String getEngineUrl(String serverSpec)
                           throws NamingException
        Returns engine URL for another server, using server specification as input. Server specification can be one of the following forms a) URL of the form t3://host:port, iiop://host:port, rmi://host:port, http://host:port/context_and_path b) a logical server name, in which case the URL is obtained from property mdw.remote.server. c) server_name@URL
        Parameters:
        serverSpec -
        Returns:
        URL for the engine
        Throws:
        NamingException
